name: Falang for Divi Lite
author: Faboba

sections.description:
The Falang for Divi plugin makes your Divi page translation simpler. You need to have your site working with the Falang system for translation.

You don’t have to duplicate the page anymore to translate it, just translate only what is necessary. It’s easier to maintain and all parameters are the same for all languages.

Concept

Translate static text ,url, textarea, from the main language to other languages.

Free vs Pro

The lite version has only a few modules (Accordion,Bar Counter, Button, Click to Action , Team Member, Text)
The Pro version add the other modules from
* Divi (all modules)
* Divi Supreme Pro
* Divi Flash
* Divi Plus

Other Module done by Third party Divi module can be done on demand.

presentation

Quick start video

Falang and Falang for Divi Lite
(French version, english version soon )

Known issues

  • Post and Page need to be set to “all languages”
sections.installation:
Note : This plugin works with Divi. Make sure you have Divi installed.
Note : This plugin works with Falang. Make sure you have Falang installed and configured with at least 2 languages

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
• Where to find help?
    First time users should read the Falang for Divi – Documentation, which explains the basics (with screenshots – in English).
sections.changelog:
= 1.20 (2024/05/24)
* fix module blog post filtered by categories
* add meta_categories to category list
* remove by css the messages readonly on translation field
* add new filter to support global module translation (need change in Divi actually)

= 1.19 (2024/04/03)
* compatible WP 6.5
* display support message for DiviPlus modules supported
* display support message for Supreme modules supported
* add new WP 6.5 plugin dependencies

= 1.18 (2024/02/19)
* improve video addon’s (media add insert from url)

= 1.17 (2024/02/09)
* add mobile_options for field (phone,tablet)
* add hover option support for field
* display support message for Heading module (Divi)

= 1.16 (2024/01/30)
* improve the way the field are added in backend for translation

= 1.15 (2024/01/17)
* display support message for DiviFlash modules supported

= 1.14 (2023/11/23)
* compatible WP 6.4
* display support message for flipbox module (supreme)
* display support message for badges module (supreme)

= 1.13 (2023/09/21)
* fix empty paragraph added on module with content
* display support message for Supreme Divi
* fix for Slider and Pro version (slider and full slider item are translated in the content/Text)

= 1.12 (2023/05/22)
* display support message for Image

= 1.11 (2023/03/30)
* compatible WP 6.2
* display support message for Beore/After image slider (supreme)
* display support message for Business hours (supreme)

1.10 (2023/03/06)

  • fix bug in pro message display (list not merged)

1.9 (2023/03/01)

  • display message on each supported modules in Falang for Divi Pro

1.8 (2023/02/07)

  • add filter falang_divi_override_content (fix

<

p> problem addded in translation)

  • compatible with WordPress 6.1

  • fix theme-editor save
  • fix admin notices
  • compatible with WordPress 6.0

  • new lite-pro system
  • rebuild with json module

1.4 (22/06/2021)

  • fix ACF Fields in text content (shortcode in text content)

1.3 (14/01/2021)

  • fix blog module exerpt display
  • fix category translation for Blog Module
  • fix Custom Search by BestWebSoft Category Page

1.2 (09/12/2020)

  • fix issue with text encoding
  • support WordPress 5.6

1.1 (04/11/2020)

  • Add assets on wordpress.org

1.0 (03/11/2020)

  • Initial release
